fun.connor.cafe.domain

Class ProductionModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.inject.AbstractModule
      • fun.connor.cafe.domain.ProductionModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.inject.Module

    public class ProductionModule
extends com.google.inject.AbstractModule
    The Guice Module for the production configuration of the application. The production configuration includes MongoDB implementations for all persistent data stores, Google Client-ID based authentication, and a default implementation of the score calculator

public com.mongodb.MongoClient mongoClient()

      • securityDatastore

        @Provides
 @Singleton
public xyz.morphia.Datastore securityDatastore(com.mongodb.MongoClient client,
                                                                       xyz.morphia.Morphia morphia)
        Provider method for the security Datastore repository. This singleton object provides persistence for security related objects. The security datastore should not be used in normal handler methods as it exists outside the "normal" domain of the application. The datastore is thread safe.
        Parameters:
        client - The MongoDb client. See mongoClient()
        morphia - The Morphia singleton. See morphia()
        Returns:
        The security datastore singleton.

      • accountDatastore

        @Named(value="accountDatastore")
 @Provides
 @Singleton
public xyz.morphia.Datastore accountDatastore(com.mongodb.MongoClient client,
                                                                                                         xyz.morphia.Morphia morphia)
        Provider method for the account Datastore. This singleton provides low-level persistence for account data. This is the main datastore for the application. The datastore is thread safe.
        Parameters:
        client - The MongoDb client. See mongoClient()
        morphia - The Morphia singleton. See morphia()
        Returns:
        The security datastore singleton.

      • googleIdTokenVerifier

        @Provides
public com.google.api.client.googleapis.auth.oauth2.GoogleIdTokenVerifier googleIdTokenVerifier(com.google.api.client.http.HttpTransport transport,
                                                                                                           com.google.api.client.json.JsonFactory jsonFactory)
        Provider method for a GoogleIdTokenVerifier object. This is used to verify Google Client-ID tokens.
        Parameters:
        transport - Pluggable HttpTransport. See clientTransport()
        jsonFactory - See jsonFactory()
        Returns:
        a new GoogleIdTokenVerifier object
